sentences: JAPAN said the COP should provide guidance to the GEF on project eligibility and criteria, but not on issues related to the GEFs management.
MICRONESIA emphasized SIDS difficulties in accessing funds.

NEW ZEALAND suggested that the GEF should be more flexible and provide support for small-scale projects in SIDS. A contact group, co-chaired by Rawleston Moore (Barbados) and Jozef Buys (Belgium), will address the SCCF, implementation of decision 5/CP.8 and additional guidance to the GEF.
Chair Stoycheva will prepare draft conclusions on the report of the GEF.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
